The RealReal | Product Engineers | San Francisco | ONSITE www.therealreal.com

As Director of Consumer Products Engineering at the foremost name in luxury consignment - therealreal.com - I am looking to build out my team by a few key frontend-leaning, full-stack, Rails people.

The company is Series E-stable and our HQ is located on the sixth floor of a building near Fishermanâ€™s Wharf with sweeping panoramic views of the bay. Our salaries are competitive and we still have equity to offer.

Interview process : 1) initial questions 2) tech phone screen 3) onsite 4) offer
